titles.title: A bill to modify the date as of which certain tribal land of the Lytton Rancheria of California is deemed to be held in trust.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 109-18.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator McCain without amendment. With written report No. 109-136.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 204.

bill.summary: 9/12/2005--Reported to Senate without amendment. Amends the Omnibus Indian Advancement Act to repeal the declaration that specified lands accepted by the Secretary of the Interior for the benefit of the Lytton Rancheria in California shall be deemed to have been held in trust and part of the reservation before October 17, 1988. (The date on the recorded deed is October 16, 2000.)
